KAKelvin AngLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 27 Mar 2019It depends on your needs. I however gotten Whole Life policy when I first started work around the same age as I was looking at policies that provide some returns upon surrender after holding for at least 35 years. Eventually I gotten Term Life policy via MINDEF insured under AVIVA in my 30s. Premium for 500K was relatively cheap as compared to others in market despite the rates would increase following your age increases.0 comments0
